summary: This document is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding difficulties obtaining information about an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The sender, an Acting SDAD/CPD with the Federal Bureau of Prisons, indicates that an Associate Warden can provide information and notes that the U.S. Marshals Service and the Chief for the Southern District of New York office have been unable to get details from the Warden and Assistant Warden.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the high-profile prisoner involved in an incident at MCC New York.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.role: Associate Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: Referenced as the person who can provide information about the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: Mentioned as someone from whom the U.S. Marshals Service and the Chief for the S/New York office have been unable to obtain information.

persons.name: Assistant Warden
persons.role: Assistant Warden at MCC New York
persons.context: Mentioned alongside the Warden as someone unresponsive to information requests from law enforcement.

persons.name: Acting SDAD/CPD
persons.role: Acting Senior Deputy Assistant Director/Chief of Prisons Division
persons.context: Sender of the email, offering to facilitate contact with the Associate Warden for information about the Epstein incident.

persons.name: Chief
persons.role: Chief for the Southern District of New York office
persons.context: Referenced as having had no luck obtaining information from the Warden and Assistant Warden regarding the Epstein incident.

connections.description: The Associate Warden is indicated as having information about an incident involving prisoner Jeffrey Epstein.
Both are senior staff at MCC New York who were unresponsive to information requests about the Epstein incident.
The Chief for the S/New York office attempted to get information from the Warden about the Epstein incident but was unsuccessful.

events.title: Information Request About Epstein Incident
events.description: An email is sent seeking basic information about an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York, noting difficulties in obtaining details from facility leadership.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
320 1st St. NW, HOLC Washington, DC 2034 (Federal Bureau of Prisons office)
keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, there was an incident involving high-profile prisoner Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The U.S. Marshals Service and the Chief for the Southern District of New York office were unable to obtain basic information about the incident from the Warden and Assistant Warden at MCC New York.
An Acting SDAD/CPD with the Federal Bureau of Prisons indicated that an Associate Warden could provide the needed information about the Epstein incident.
The document highlights communication challenges and lack of transparency from MCC New York staff regarding an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.
